init.title: ISY994 Options
init.description: Any device or folder that contains 'Node Sensor String' in the name will be treated as a sensor or binary sensor. Any device with 'Ignore String' in the name will be ignored. Any variable that contains 'Variable Sensor String' will be added as a sensor. If 'Restore Light Brightness' is enabled, the previous brightness will be restored when turning on a light instead of the On-Level.
